data.name: Echoed Memories - Swimsuit Costumes
data.detailed_description:
A collection of "Beach Episode" costumes, giving all 13 - THIRTEEN - protagonists a swimsuit to wear, available for pure amusement.

Contains 13 swimsuit costumes (one per character)
data.about_the_game:
A collection of "Beach Episode" costumes, giving all 13 - THIRTEEN - protagonists a swimsuit to wear, available for pure amusement.

Contains 13 swimsuit costumes (one per character)
data.short_description: A collection of "Beach Episode" costumes, giving all 13 - THIRTEEN - protagonists a swimsuit to wear, available for pure amusement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains Swimsuit Costumes.
This refers to characters wearing varied styles of swimsuits.
Please be advised that installing this DLC will give you access to characters wearing a piece of clothing meant for use at a beach. Please take caution when choosing to use this DLC if you are sensitive to moderately revealing swimsuits.
Beware of speedos and catgirls who are trying too hard. Use at own risk.
